Name: Hermelinda
description:
Meet Hermelinda. She is from a farming community in East Panama called La Moneda and has always been interested in agriculture and food production. Apart from farming, Hermelinda also makes empanadas (a traditional Panamanian dumpling) that she makes at home and sells to her community.

Hermelinda is applying for a first Kiva loan to invest in chicks and grow her sustainable chicken farming microenterprise. Hermelinda has taken out a loan in the past and fully paid it back, demonstrating her responsibility and commitment with her financial obligations.

Thank you for helping Hermelinda grow her sustainable chicken farming micro-enterprise.
